effects: You always have the spells in the Clockwork Spells table prepared at the sorcerer levels shown.
When you cast any sorcerer spell, consult the Manifestations of Order table and choose or randomly determine how your connection to order manifests.

feature_defs.trigger: when a creature you can see within 60 feet is about to roll a d20 with advantage or disadvantage
effects: You prevent the roll from being affected by advantage or disadvantage.
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

effects: You expend 1 to 5 sorcery points to create a magical ward around yourself or a creature you can see within 30 feet.
The ward is represented by a number of d8s equal to the sorcery points spent.
When the warded creature takes damage, it can expend any number of those dice to reduce the damage by the total rolled.
limits: The ward lasts until you finish a long rest or until you use this feature again.

effects: You enter a trance for 1 minute.
For the duration, attack rolls against you cant benefit from advantage, and when you make a d20 test you can treat a roll of 9 or lower as a 10.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you spend 5 sorcery points (no action required) to restore its use.

effects: You summon spirits of order in a 30-foot cube originating from you; they vanish after creating the effects below.
Heal: restore up to 100 hit points, divided as you choose among creatures of your choice in the cube.
Repair: any damaged objects entirely in the cube are repaired instantly.
Dispel: every spell of level 6 or lower ends on creatures and objects of your choice in the cube.
limits: Once you use this action, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you spend 7 sorcery points (no action required) to restore its use.
